header.description: Two system-injected scalars: the report render date and render time, set from the server clock at generation time. Not sourced from the database.

rows.description: One row per measurement event from neuract__ANALYSER_TABLE. Each row captures a UTC timestamp and readings for all 10 analyser instruments in wide format. The timestamp column is formatted for display as the row label.

totals.description: No totals section in this report.

semantics: No required filter parameters are declared. date_from and date_to are optional pass-through filters applied to timestamp_utc to support day-wise or month-wise time selection as indicated in the footer. print_date and print_time are system-generated scalars injected at render time.
transformations: Format timestamp_utc from ISO 8601 to DD-MM-YYYY HH:MM:SS for display in the row_analysers column.
Apply number(3) formatting to ORP, TDS, and DO readings.
Apply number(2) formatting to PH readings.
No reshape: data is already wide-format with one instrument per column.
